mode.name: available_prefixes
mode.query: SELECT text as prefix FROM web_user_prefix WHERE text != '.' AND text != ' ' ORDER BY text

mode.name: available_countries
mode.query: SELECT vc.code, nvl(short_name_tl, short_name) as name FROM valid_countries vc, valid_countries_tl tl where tl.lang (+) = :lang and tl.code (+)= vc.code ORDER BY vc.short_name
